name: RestAR Ltd.
description: Developer of a cloud-based 3D scanning and AR technology intended to convert physical products into the content. The company's software combines both computer vision and deep learning algorithms based on cutting-edge academic research where owners to scan and render high-quality 3D content based on physical products in e-commerce and food markets using a mobile device, enabling business to enhance the consumers' overall experience.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based 3D scanning and AR technology intended to convert physical products into the content. The company's software combines both computer vision and deep learning algorithms based on cutting-edge academic research where owners to scan and render high-quality 3D content based on physical products in e-commerce and food markets using a mobile device, enabling business to enhance the consumers' overall experience.
